name: 10TH Zambia Mining and Energy Conference 2021
content: Following its great success during the last decade, the 10th edition of Zambia International Mining and Energy Conference and Exhibition is confirmed for 04 – 05 May 2021\. This edition the event goes virtual. For the past 9 years, AME Trade, supported by the Zambian Government and the Chamber of Mines has strived to enhance the mining and energy industries, by bringing all stakeholders together at the Zambia International Mining and Energy Conference and Exhibition. The 10th edition of ZIMEC remains dedicated to providing the audience latest information on developments within the sectors, highlighting new opportunities and providing a platform for public and private sector players to network. The event will bring together the most influential industry players to share their experience and knowledge during the 2-day virtual conference, under the following theme: “Dialogue and Partnerships to Unlock Investment, Recovery and Growth”
